title: Kerning list
content:
Are there any lists available with the most common [kerning](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713123412/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/kerning) combinations just to make sure you don't forget anything?  
I've written them down myself a couple of times, but I'm still not sure I haven't left any combinations out myself.
author: ill sans

comments.content:

Juan Pablo De Gregorio  
 [http://www.typies.blogspot.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713123412/http:/www.typies.blogspot.com/ "http://www.typies.blogspot.com")

Wow, thanks for taking the time to type that! ;-)  
Now I'll always have an online reference.

Tom,

I wouldn't expect it to be accessible online forever. Select it from the webpage, copy and paste it into a text file, and save it to your computer. That's probably where Juan's text resides. Type designers need to have texts like this saved and ready for testing. Stay tuned to this thread and other files may be revealed!

That's a pretty extensive list. Leslie Cabarga has a pretty good list in his [Logo, Font & Lettering Bible](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713123412/http:/www.amazon.com/Logo-Font-Lettering-Bible-Comprehensive/dp/1581804369/sr=8-1/qid=1163706564/ref=pd_bbs_sr_1/104-7912967-6703914?ie=UTF8&s=books).

I'd add wiki links, but I don't know how to do that.

in fact, [Leslie Cabarga](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713123412/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Leslie%20Cabarga)'s Kern King is on his site:

[http://logofontandlettering.com/kernking.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713123412/http:/logofontandlettering.com/kernking.html "http://logofontandlettering.com/kernking.html")

I find that it's very helpful to have real words in your kerning copy to help make judgements on consistency. Here's my list for use in FontLab's Metrics window [the text file is always available on my site: [http://www.hackberry-fonts.com/practical-font-design.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713123412/http:/www.hackberry-fonts.com/practical-font-design.html "http://www.hackberry-fonts.com/practical-font-design.html") ):
